alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 1:14AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western New London and central Middlesex Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Lyme, or near Salem, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Colchester, Salem, Waterford, East Lyme, East Haddam, Lebanon, Sprague, Bozrah, Lyme, North Lyme, Montville, Franklin and Millington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London
